I've started bringing a snack to work so I'm not starving by the time my students arrive.

content.text: Hey I'm trying to adjust to Swedish life.
I would love to visit Sweden sometime! I hear it's beautiful.
It is! I live in a small town but there's so much to do here.
What do you do for work?
I'm a lifestyle blogger and I love my job. I get to share my favorite things with people and meet new people all the time.
That sounds amazing! I wish I could do something I love as much as you love your job.
I'm sure you could! What do you like to do?
I like to fantasize and I like my job but I would like more time to sleep.
I hear you, I don't get enough sleep either. But I'm glad you enjoy your job!
Thanks, I love it! I'm a teacher and I love working with kids.
That's awesome! I've always thought about being a teacher but I'm not sure if I'm cut out for it.
It's definitely not for everyone but it's a lot of fun. I love seeing the light bulb go off in my students' heads when they finally understand something.
That sounds really rewarding. I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks, I do! What do you do for fun?
I like to hang out with my friends, go to the movies, and I love to cook.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun! I'm not much of a cook but I love going to the movies.
I'm sure you'd be a great cook! And there's nothing like a good movie to relax with.
I'm sure I would be too! And yes, movies are the best
